seo.title: Azure consultants — landing zones, migration & DevOps | SSW
seo.description: Azure experts for landing zones, migration, modern apps, DevOps, security, and FinOps. Fast wins, secure by default.

blocks.finalBreadcrumb: Azure consultants — landing zones, migration & DevOps | SSW

blocks.heading: From quick assessments to secure, scalable platforms, **we make Azure work for you.**
blocks.description: Azure can be complex. We keep it simple and outcome-driven. Our consultants analyse your environment and deliver practical improvements that boost reliability, security, and speed while keeping costs under control.

features.heading: Built for real-world cloud teams
features.description: From strategy to hands-on delivery, we help you get Azure right the first time.

features.heading: Secure, scalable, and cost-efficient
features.description: Get guidance that improves reliability, strengthens security, and cuts unnecessary spend.

mediaConfiguration.altText: Meeting with an Azure Solution Architect

blocks.heading: Trusted in Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, & Newcastle by
Planning a move to Azure? Start with a proven **migration roadmap.**
blocks.description:
We work with regulated, high-scale, multi-subscription Azure estates. Our consultants review your environment, identify quick wins, and deliver secure, scalable cloud solutions that reduce cost and improve performance.

Whether you’re migrating, modernizing, or tightening security, we give you a clear path forward.

features.heading: Practical advice, proven results
features.description: We analyse your environment and give you a clear plan with fast, low-risk wins.

features.heading: Control your costs
features.description: SpendOps guidance that keeps your Azure bill predictable and transparent.

blocks.heading: Azure Landing Zones
blocks.body: A clear, secure, repeatable foundation for any workload in Azure.

accordionItems.label: Cloud Migrations
accordionItems.content: We assess your existing environment, plan the move, and migrate workloads safely into Azure. Whether it’s rehost, refactor, or modernise, we ensure reliability and cost efficiency.

accordionItems.label: DevOps & CI/CD Automation
accordionItems.content: We build automated CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions, improve deployment speed, reduce failures, and set you up with a clean development workflow.

cards.heading: Azure Synapse
cards.description: An integrated enterprise analytics service that unifies data warehousing and big data systems.

cards.heading: Docker
cards.description: Containerization platform that packages applications with their dependencies, enabling consistent deployments across any environment.

cards.heading: Kubernetes
cards.description: Container orchestration platform for deploying, scaling, and managing containerized applications in production environments.

cards.heading: Azure App Service
cards.description: A fully managed platform-as-a-service (PaaS) for hosting web applications, REST APIs, and mobile backends.

cards.heading: Power BI
cards.description: Transform complex SQL data into intuitive, actionable business insights.

blocks.heading: Talk to us about your Azure project today
blocks.description: Connect with our Account Managers to discuss how we can help.
